name: Into the Swarm
description:
Survive the onslaught of the swarm to reach the only thing powerful to defeat them for good.

My second game for Variety MegaJam 3

Mouse+Keyboard:

A/D - move

W/Space - jump

Mouse Cursor - aim

Left Click - attack

Gamepad:

Left Stick/D-Pad - move

Left Trigger - jump

Right Stick - aim

Right Trigger - attack

R to Restart
